import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import useSound from 'use-sound' import clickSound from '../sounds/click_5.mp3' import scrollSound from '../sounds/click_4.mp3' const MainMenu = (props) => { const [click] = useSound( clickSound, { volume: 0.8 } ) const [scroll] = useSound( scrollSound, { volume: 0.8 } ) return(
scroll()} onClick={() => click()} role="img" aria-label="menuIcon">âœ…    SIGN IN scroll()} onClick={() => click()} role="img" aria-label="menuIcon">ğŸ     HOME SEARCH scroll()} onClick={() => click()} role="img" aria-label="menuIcon">ğŸ“Š    MY CHARITIES scroll()} onClick={() => click()} role="img" aria-label="menuIcon">ğŸ’¬    MY MESSAGES scroll()} onClick={() => click()} role="img" aria-label="menuIcon">â¤ï¸    MY PROFILE scroll()} onClick={() => click()} role="img" aria-label="menuIcon">ğŸ‘‹    SIGN OUT
) } export default MainMenu
